name: Hachimaru-blog
body:
### Hachimaru - A match 3 game
Hachimaru is a twist on traditional match 3 games. Swipe left or right to move a whole row, or up or down to move a whole column. Gain points by matching 3 or more materials, and remember that matches wrap around!

Coming soon for for android and ios. . .

### Contact
Direct questions or suggestions to matafc@yahoo.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
